Posts.Content: May 14, 2009 01:24PM Dorrien wrote: I know this is not the topic but I need some advice-- I had mastectomy and tran flap done last year since then i have developed several no multiple fat necrosis my orignial plastic md said no problem as i started getting them but now they have taken over at least 1/3 of my breast and they are uncomfortableÂ  I have seen 2 other plastics since then and both said they have to come out but since they are so extensive at this point no one can provmise that i will heal well Has ANYONE ever gotten fat necrosis from their flap and what did you do about it Thanks so much for any info
Posts.Title: For my Mom aka Superwoman Nicole_Bronx Nicole_Bronx
